title: Testing Services

lists: We strongly believe Software Quality Engineering is an integral part of the software development lifecycle.

subServices.content: As a foremost automation testing company we recognize require for holistic automation testing services, rather than pertain mechanization from a typical perception, since doing so confines the Quality of the products. It is our plan, to ensure high ROI and overall analogy with all raised area that you try to find for your business. Automation testing services are a strategic move to make certain exactness and focus in the empire of product development and ensure decrease in the overall cost of testing while considerably rising quality.

bullet.title: We are using the below Aspects to Automate the Projects
lists: Capture/rerun is not a long-term resolution. Recording screen match up rarely works.
Avoid recreating, reuse existing scripts wherever possible.
Supervision support is critical, but potential must be pragmatic.
A well-planned pilot project gives a sound groundwork for automation.
Considering prioritization of tests when they are automated.
Maintain Client interest and support with recurrent reports about the automation

subServices.serviceTitle: Data Warehouse and ETL Testing Services
subServices.content: Normally every organization will have dedicated databases for every business line. And it keeps only current data in order to offer better performance in production environment. ETL, the process used during the transferring of data between databases is one of the significant concepts in data warehousing. This process of ETL consists of sub-processes like Extracting of the data from the source database, transforming the extracted data to the format required to be accepted into the destination database and then finally loading the transformed data into the data warehouse.

bullet.title: For ETL Testing OpsEazy is using the below aspects
lists: We identify  the ETL tool which contains procedures and rules for extracting and processing data, eliminating the need for traditional programming methods that are labor-intensive and expensive.

We have experts ETL Team who are well versed in compatibility with cloud data warehouse, ERP and CRM platforms such as Amazon Web Services, Salesforce, Oracle, Kinesis, Google Cloud Platform, NetSuite, and more.

We know DevOps expands to cloud-based data environments and processes, there is a need for automated data integration with ETL testing tools that can process larger amounts of data autonomously without need for human intervention  in real-time.

subServices.content: OpsEazy can offer you with dexterity, acquaintance & development to initiate and apply a consistent testing strategy involving automated build processes and automated testing throughout the lifecycle of a project. Using different procedure will reduce cost as quality control is forced throughout the project
